title: T206 Joe Lake Tolstoi w/ Toytown Stamp

posts.post_title: T206 Joe Lake Tolstoi w/ Toytown Stamp
posts.post_content: T206 Joe Lake Tolstoi w/ Toytown Stamp on back. Graded a 20 by SGC.  No creases.  $240 which includes shipping with delivery confirmation. Commitment to buy will take precedence over any ongoing conversations.
